item.title: 拜登总统宣布第一夫人吉尔-拜登（Jill Biden）将发起白宫有史以来第一项关于妇女健康研究的倡议。"妇女占我国人口的一半以上，但有关妇女健康的研究一直资金不足。#SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden announces that first Lady Jill Biden will launch the first ever White House initiative on women’s health research.

“Women are more than half our population, but research on women’s health has always been underfunded.” #SOTU2024 https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/8PzvUzBHPh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中谈到美国的 "未来 "时说，他希望美国 "涓滴经济的时代结束，富人和最大的公司不再获得所有税收减免"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden talks about the "future" of America in his State of the Union address, saying he wants a country "where the days of trickle-down economics are over, and the wealthy and the biggest corporations no longer get all the tax breaks."https://t.co/sEu9ROhlbW pic.twitter.com/Q5k08RYYcx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统斥责那些投票反对《两党基础设施法》的共和党人 现在却 "为钱的到来而欢呼""如果你们中有人不希望这些钱进入你们的选区 请告诉我"#SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden calls out Republicans who voted against the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law but are now “cheering on the money coming on.”

“If any of you don’t want that money in your district, just let me know.” #SOTU2024 https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/UgLVxe760S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统："我要对美国人民说：当美国被击倒时，我们会重新站起来。我们继续前进。这就是美国......今晚，我们可以骄傲地说，我们的联邦国家很强大，而且越来越强大。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden: "I say to the American people: when America gets knocked down, we get back up. We keep going. That's America...Tonight we can proudly say the state of our union is strong and getting stronger." https://t.co/meOdcxP5qp #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/YPPPl4nIYb

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登在 2024 年国情咨文中表示，他相信 "罗伊诉韦德案是正确的"，并誓言将其恢复为 "国家法律"：
item.description:
In his 2024 State of the Union address, Biden said he believes "Roe v. Wade got it right," and vows to restore it as the "law of the land."

Live updates: https://t.co/kx1MayXWEM pic.twitter.com/GGp3J1xM7y

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 恕我直言，大法官们，女性并非没有选举或政治权力。"拜登总统在就推翻 "罗伊诉韦德案 "发表讲话时，向会议厅内的最高法院大法官们致辞。#SOTU2024
item.description:
“With all due respect, justices, women are not without electoral or political power."

Pres. Biden addresses the Supreme Court justices in the chamber during remarks about the overturning of Roe v. Wade. #SOTU2024 https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/4EL99vTxJV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在SOTU："如果你们美国人民给我一个支持选择权的国会 我向你们保证：我将再次将'罗伊诉韦德案'恢复为美国法律"。 I will restore Roe v. Wade as the law of the land again." #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden at SOTU: "If you the American people send me a Congress that supports the right to choose I promise you: I will restore Roe v. Wade as the law of the land again." https://t.co/0VU5KjqQ9r #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/lkqmR0i0tN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在SOTU："我的前任和在座的一些人试图掩盖 1 月 6 日的真相......这里有一个简单的事实：你不能只在获胜时才热爱自己的国家。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden at SOTU: "My predecessor and some of you here seek to bury the truth about Jan. 6 ... here is the simple truth: You can't love your country only when you win." https://t.co/khhzr1nbir #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/rDGmRykjcE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中表示将继续支持乌克兰，并称如果 "美国一走了之，乌克兰将面临危险"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden speaks on his continued support for Ukraine in his State of the Union address, saying if "the United States walks away, it will put Ukraine at risk."https://t.co/QjT63cVz4p pic.twitter.com/XGa4JaXEW2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中说："如果在座各位认为普京会止步于乌克兰，我保证他不会。如果我们与乌克兰站在一起，并提供乌克兰自卫所需的武器，乌克兰就能阻止普京。
item.description:
Pres. Biden in his State of the Union address:

"If anybody in this room thinks Putin will stop at Ukraine, I assure he will not. Ukraine can stop Putin if we stand with Ukraine and provide the weapons that it needs to defend itself."https://t.co/GQljleSYI3 pic.twitter.com/mHPuCbVd4d

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统斥责前总统特朗普有关普京的言论，称其前任 "向俄罗斯领导人低头"。"我认为这很过分，很危险，是不可接受的。" #SOTU
item.description:
Pres. Biden calls out former Pres. Trump’s remarks about Vladimir Putin, says his predecessor is "bowing down to a Russian leader."

"I think it’s outrageous, it’s dangerous and it’s unacceptable.” https://t.co/0VU5KjqQ9r #SOTU pic.twitter.com/z7cY4Fq2YC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在SOTU演说中："如果在座各位认为普京会止步于乌克兰，我保证他不会。如果我们与乌克兰站在一起，并提供乌克兰自卫所需的武器，乌克兰就能阻止普京。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden in his SOTU address: "If anybody in this room thinks Putin will stop at Ukraine, I assure he will not. Ukraine can stop Putin if we stand with Ukraine and provide the weapons that it needs to defend itself." https://t.co/khhzr1nbir #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/sa1rxTgd3D

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文中开宗明义："如果我聪明的话，我现在就回家" #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden opens State of the Union address: "If I were smart, I'd go home now." https://t.co/xEtuF3lbbY #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/J86zUF3ORZ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

It is a potentially pivotal evening for Biden in the early stages of his 2024 general election fight — set to be against Trump.

item.title: 两位与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关系疏远的美国共和党州长现在已经为特朗普背书，而之前处于观望状态的其他保守派领导人也在大选初期向特朗普抛出了橄榄枝。
item.description:
Two GOP governors who had distant relationships with Donald Trump have now issued endorsements, as other conservative leaders previously on the sidelines also throw their support to Trump in the early stages of the general election.https://t.co/rxJ9Dj9fG7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 经过几个月的药物治疗周期后，这位 37 岁的阿拉巴马州妇女准备在 3 月 4 日进行胚胎移植。但是，阿拉巴马州最高法院 2 月 16 日的裁决颠覆了她的治疗方案。
item.description:
After months of medication cycles, this 37-year-old Alabama woman was gearing up for an embryo transfer on March 4. But the Alabama Supreme Court's decision on Feb. 16 upended the course of her treatment. https://t.co/TUimD1eQ0g

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 2012 年，美国记者詹姆斯-福里在报道叙利亚内战时被 ISIS 恐怖分子绑架，两年后被该组织公开斩首。
item.description:
In 2012, American journalist James Foley was kidnapped by ISIS terrorists while he was covering the Syrian civil war and was publicly beheaded by the group two years later.

Now, his mother is telling his story in a new book. https://t.co/W4HZ3PlubO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 📸:传说，如果把一枚硬币扔进罗马许愿池，就意味着你将回到永恒之城。但是，游客留在那里的现金会怎么样呢？
item.description:
📸: Legend says that if you throw a coin over your shoulder into Rome's Trevi Fountain it means you will return to the Eternal City. But what happens to the cash tourists leave there? pic.twitter.com/g2ky7wfTb3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周四，纽约一名法官驳回了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的暂时推迟对 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案处罚的请求，留给这位前总统三天时间来支付或交纳全部 8,330 万美元判决的保证金。
item.description:
A New York judge on Thursday denied Donald Trump's request for a temporary delay of the penalties in E. Jean Carroll's defamation case, leaving the former president three days to pay or post a bond for the entire $83.3 million judgment. https://t.co/N3HXv2YJo7 pic.twitter.com/NRF5cgyty2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉暂停总统竞选活动似乎证实了唐纳德-特朗普在美国共和党内的巨无霸地位--但这可能揭示了其党内的潜在分歧，并自相矛盾地有助于保持其凝聚力。
item.description:
Nikki Haley suspending her presidential campaign seemed to confirm Donald Trump's juggernaut status within the GOP — but it may have illuminated the underlying divisions within her party and paradoxically helped maintain its cohesion. https://t.co/antbVfwlRv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 皇家加勒比游轮公司的一名员工被指控在客舱浴室内藏匿摄像头，以监视包括未成年少女在内的游客。
item.description:
A Royal Caribbean cruise employee is accused of hiding cameras inside bathrooms of passenger cabins to spy on guests, including underage girls. https://t.co/9fVZja17Bm pic.twitter.com/7nFqUyAud5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在阿拉巴马州最高法院关于冷冻胚胎是 "儿童 "的判决引发的政治风波中，乔-拜登总统预计将利用周四的国情咨文演讲将自己和民主党人塑造成生殖自由的捍卫者。
item.description:
Amid the political fallout over the Alabama Supreme Court decision that frozen embryos are "children," Pres. Joe Biden is expected to use his State of the Union address Thursday to cast himself, and Democrats, as defenders of reproductive freedom.https://t.co/ebCZyHy0zG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024
